item.description:
Each summer Boston hosts two August Moon weekend festivals in Chinatown.

One of these shall be August 16th, a Sunday, with events, crafts, people and things to see all afernoon and until about 5:00 p.m.

It would be my honor to meet with those of you that have time and would enjoy being in town that morning for some Dim Sum, and if time and weather permits, perhaps some walking around to see what we can see.

There are of course several places to enjoy Dim Sum. I have selected Empire Garden because of my positive experiences there (listed as "Empire Garden", also sometimes called "Emperor's Garden").
**************
Some of you might ask why Boston has two (2) separate August Moon Festivals - I'm not allowed to tell, I am only allowed to enjoy both - but feel free to do your own research on this!

Hope to see you there, and if not, Happy August Moon!
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait with sign in front of entrance doors

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: DIM SUM August Moon Festival
